a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Annual temperature anomalies relative to the pre-industrial period,
The difference in average land-sea surface temperature compared to the 1861-1890 mean, in degrees Celsius.
Data source: Met Office Hadley Centre - HadCRUT5 (2025)

Note: The period 1861–1890 is used as the baseline to measure temperature changes relative to pre-industrial times,
as recommended by
